backend/main.mo: Empty Motoko actor with no backend logic.
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report describing logo-processing functionality and related components.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Collection of short summaries for all major frontend source files.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base styles and OKLCH color tokens for light and dark themes.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with meta tags and script loader for the React app.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component assembling header, sections, and footer.
frontend/src/components/LogoMark.tsx: Logo component rendering the generated PATIL logo asset.
frontend/src/components/Sections/AboutSe: About section showing company description, highlights, and a stats card.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Contact: Contact form with validation plus contact info and business hours.
frontend/src/components/Sections/HeroSec: Hero banner with intro text, background image, and navigation buttons.
frontend/src/components/Sections/Service: Services grid rendering service cards with icons and descriptions.
frontend/src/components/SiteFooter.tsx: Footer with logo, quick links, services list, and attribution.
frontend/src/components/SiteHeader.tsx: Responsive header with logo and navigation links, including a mobile menu using a sheet and smooth scroll behavior.
frontend/src/content/siteCopy.ts: Static content definitions for hero, about, and detailed service descriptions used across the site.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: React hook that creates and caches a backend actor tied to Internet Identity authentication and invalidates queries when identity changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Context and provider for managing Internet Identity auth state, including login, logout, and loading stored identities.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder file for future React Query hooks; currently exports nothing.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind base styles and custom CSS variables defining a construction-themed color palette and dark mode.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts React, sets up React Query, and wraps the app with the Internet Identity provider.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind configuration with extended colors, fonts, animations, container settings, and plugins for typography and animations.
project_state.json: Project metadata tracking features, requirements, logo-processing tasks, and pending clarifications.
